      • features_reply_module

        private OFFeaturesReplySerializerModule features_reply_module
        Custom Serializer for FEATURES_REPLY message. This is used to handle the REST URI /wm/core/switch/{switchid}/features/json.

      • port_module

        private OFPortSerializerModule port_module
        Custom Serializer for OFPort

      • flow_statistics_reply_module

        private OFFlowStatisticsReplySerializerModule flow_statistics_reply_module
        Custom Serializer for FLOW_STATISTICS_REPLY message. This is used to handle the REST URI /wm/core/switch/{switchid}/flow/json.

      • apis

        private OFModel.RESTApi[] apis
        Array of RESTApi objects. Each objects represent a REST call handler routine bound to a specific URI.
